summary: Users cannot understand how to specify search attribute types when using StartWorkflowExecution. The proto definition lacks documentation on how to parse SearchAttributes Payloads and map them to IndexedValueType enums.
userImpact: Developers cannot properly configure custom search attributes without trial-and-error or external documentation, hindering workflow metadata capability.
proposedFix: Add comments to the SearchAttributes proto explaining how Payloads are parsed, including metadata.type field mapping and data format requirements (e.g., INDEXED_VALUE_TYPE_DATETIME expects milliseconds since epoch).
keyQuote: Each Payload has a `metadata.type: IndexedValueType`. If `payload.metadata.type` is `INDEXED_VALUE_TYPE_DATETIME`, `payload.data` should be an integer with milliseconds since epoch.
